trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events related to cell and row operations.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理与单元格和行操作相关的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave> event handlers to determine whether a cell can be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave>事件处理程序，以确定是否可以单击单元格。

trans-unit.source: The example updates each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> to advertise the current image layout.
trans-unit.target: 该示例会更新每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>要播发的当前的图像布局。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码是更大的示例中所示的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。
